title: Cucumber smoked salmon bites
ingredients: ['1 1/3 large cucumbers', '120g cream cheese, softened', '2 tablespoons freshly chopped dill', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1/2 teaspoon fresh lemon juice', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '120g smoked salmon, cut into 5cm strips', '24 small sprigs fresh dill']
